Title: Sing a new song in the club
Designer: Zhejiang Academy of Fine Arts (浙江美术学院供稿)Chen Songling (陈松林)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Group singing in the clubhouse of the commune. The notation below the image is of the song Commune Members Are All Like Sunflowers (社员都是向阳花).This is a print from the third edition (July 1965).
